name: SB 1533
title: Repealed Oregon's ban on inclusionary zoning, allowing local governments to require affordable units in new multifamily projects

name: HB 4079
title: Affordable Housing Pilot Program allowing cities to expand urban growth boundaries for affordable housing

name: HB 4143
title: Tenant protection bill requiring 90 days notice for rent increases

name: SB 1582
title: Established the LIFT Housing Program to build affordable rental housing
